title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems. The issue is highlighted in red text.
OB: When choosing the project name as 'test', a static text validation error appears on the dialog.
EB: The 'Copy Project' dialog should allow selecting and copying the default location even when the 'Use Default Location' option is checked. Additionally, users should be able to choose a location near the default location.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a single project, name it 'test'.
2. Copy and paste the project.
3. On the 'Copy Project' dialog:
   a. Ensure 'Use Default Location' is checked.
   b. Verify the ability to select and copy the default location from the edit box.
   c. Attempt to choose a path close to the default location.
